LanguageData.CK_PlantWildCotton.label: wild cotton plant
LanguageData.CK_PlantWildCotton.description: Yields cotton, a fine plant fiber used to make cloth.
LanguageData.CK_PlantWildPsychoid.label: wild psychoid plant
LanguageData.CK_PlantWildPsychoid.description: A leafy plant. Its leaves can be refined into various forms of the psychoid drug.
LanguageData.CK_PlantWildRice.label: wild rice plant
LanguageData.CK_PlantWildRice.description: A short, fast-growing crop that yields small edible grains. Its great nutritional ouput and ease of cultivation has made it the economic core of many great civilizations. While rice grows quickly, it is sensitive to soil fertility and will not fare well in poor soil.
LanguageData.CK_PlantWildSmokeleaf.label: wild smokeleaf plant
LanguageData.CK_PlantWildSmokeleaf.description: A leafy plant cultivated for its psychological effects. Smokeleaf leaves can be prepared into joints at the crafting spot.
